attributes.additional_details:
Stop UK vehicle insurance companies charging extortionate prices, which discriminate European nationals against equivalent UK drivers.

My wife has 7 years No Claims Discount (NCD), gained in Spain. The cheapest insurance we could find for our 2004 Renault Megane II, 1.5dci (This is NOT a sports car, not a Porsche nor a Lamborghini), which cost us £1,900. was quoted at £1,300 per annum.!!!!

We are trying survive with my poor wages, plus my wifes income of minimum wage (£6.19 per hour, via the thieving employment agencies of this country) for slave labour in the Industry sector (currently packing at Minky's)

My boss, drives a £35,000 Jaguar and pays £350 per year... I smell a very big rat!)

Please sign this epetition and copy it to your facebook and twitter.


We demand that the Government ensures ALL European citizens are treated equally and the prices should be equivalent regardless where you have gained you NCD in Europe.
